comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Warrington_(DD-30) The first USS Warrington (DD-30) was a modified Paulding-class destroyer in the United States Navy during World War I. She was named for Lewis Warrington.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Date on negative: 4/27/15.  Also, 48 star flag on bow means it was taken after Arizona's admission in February, 1912.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks, Kilted Cowboy and artolog, for identifying the ship and narrowing down the date (good detail spotting on the flag!).  We'll adjust information when we update the description.
